body_html:
The community supported builds section is more for hardware architecture, not distro formats.

There isn't currently a good place to put this on tensorflow.org and would be difficult to maintain a list for non-first parties. But might be worth a discussion on the tensorflow discuss list or the SIG build list: https://www.tensorflow.org/community/lists
body_text:
The community supported builds section is more for hardware architecture, not distro formats.
There isn't currently a good place to put this on tensorflow.org and would be difficult to maintain a list for non-first parties. But might be worth a discussion on the tensorflow discuss list or the SIG build list: https://www.tensorflow.org/community/lists
body:
The community supported builds section is more for hardware architecture, not distro formats.

There isn't currently a good place to put this on tensorflow.org and would be difficult to maintain a list for non-first parties. But might be worth a discussion on the tensorflow discuss list or the SIG build list: https://www.tensorflow.org/community/lists
